page.title: 08A Day at School.
page.content:
We come to school at 9 o'clock in the morning and we have the register. At register we sit in a circle and the teacher sings out our names and we sing her name back. Then we have assembly. At assembly we all sit in the small room and somebody hands out some hymn books and we sing a song and say prayers.
Next we do our jobs. Jobs are things we do to learn things like maths, writing, painting and claywork.
At 12.15 we have lunch and have a play. Then, before we do our jobs again, we have silent reading. At 3.15 we go home.
